title: RocketSingh
author: RocketSingh
content: List of on chain gambling game.I asked the above to OpenAI ChatGPT3 and got the following response...QuoteHere are some examples of on-chain gambling games:    SatoshiDice - One of the first on-chain gambling games, SatoshiDice was a simple dice game where players bet on the outcome of a roll. It was built on the Bitcoin blockchain.    BitKong - A game inspired by Donkey Kong, BitKong is a simple on-chain gambling game where players try to climb a tower by correctly guessing which direction to go next.    Bustabit - A popular on-chain gambling game where players bet on a multiplier that increases with each bet. If the player cashes out before the multiplier crashes, they win their bet multiplied by the current multiplier.    Bitvest - An on-chain gambling site that offers a variety of games, including Plinko, Dice, and Bit Spin.    Chain-Bet - A gambling game built on the Litecoin blockchain where players guess the last digit of a block hash and bet on it.    BitRun - An on-chain gambling game that lets players bet on the outcome of a virtual horse race.    LuckyBit - A simple on-chain gambling game where players bet on the outcome of a coin toss.Note that the legality of on-chain gambling games may vary depending on the jurisdiction. It's important to research and understand the laws and regulations in your area before participating in any online gambling activities.Ask the same to OpenAI ChatGPT3 and let us know the response that you are getting.
